Pre-Game Insights: The highly anticipated India vs Pakistan T20 World Cup 2024 match is scheduled to take place on June 9th, 2024.
The iconic Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York will play host to this colossal clash.
Cricket enthusiasts can tune in to the Star Sports Network channels to witness every moment of the India vs Pakistan T20 World Cup 2024 match live on their television screens.
For those preferring the convenience of online streaming, Disney+ Hotstar will provide a seamless viewing experience.
Ticket prices start from a budget-friendly $175, with standard and premium seats currently priced around $300 and $400, respectively.
